ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Lvl 31 Equipment Help
ygData.msgSnippet: earings:gold topaz. +3 ac +8poison 20pp each neck: collar of undead prot 20pp head: froggie crown (not sure of price, if somone is camping the king, you might
ygData.messageBody:
earings:gold topaz. +3 ac +8poison 20pp each
neck: collar of undead prot 20pp
head: froggie crown (not sure of price, if somone is camping the king, you
might be able to get one for free)
rings: plat fire opal ac5 +55hp $500pp each
belt: thick leather apron $40pp
leggs: donno what the featherd are. I wear gaterscale(skin?) $1000-1500pp
(you could camp this with a group tho)

as for a place to hunt. get over to lesser fay and take out the fairy
guards (start with the one next to the tree first)

there are 4 spawns. once gearheart starts aggroing on you, killh im
first. you can pull him alone by attacking a fairy maden on the outskirts
of the camp. gearheart will come running, and the guards will stay
behind.

great place to practice id kitting.



On Wed, 24 May 2000, Aaron Mattingly wrote:

> I need some suggestions on what equipment I should get. I can
> spend any amount of money. This is what I have now
>
> Earrings: +2 agi
> Neck: Black Pearl Choker
> Face: Sheer Bone Mask
> Head: EXE Hood
> Rings: Jagged Bands
> Wrist 1: Silver-plated Bracer
> Wrist 2: Erolissi Bracer
> Arms: Drake-Hide
> Gloves: Wu's Fighting Guntlets
> Shoulder: Tattered Mantle
> Chest: Foreman's Tunic
> Belt: Purple Sash of Order
> Legs: Feathered Leggings
> Feet: Kobold Hide Boots
>
> Also, whats a good place to lvl group or solo at lvl 31? Thanks in
> advance for the help.
>
> Thomm Spiritjumper
> 31 monk of mith marr
>
